title: Defines probable aggregate annual income for the tenant's eligibility under guidelines set for housing authority
summary: Defines "probable aggregate annual income" for purposes of determining eligibility for limited profit and limited dividend housing companies, as the annual net income after federal, state and municipal income taxes are deducted from gross income of the chief wage earner.
